languages.text: "При Владайме честному люду вообще житья не стало... зато всяким ублюдкам раздолье!"
"Things are as hard as ever for honest folk under Vladaym... but the scumbags are having a field day!"
languages.original_text: "При Владайме честному люду вообще житья не стало... зато всяким ублюдкам раздолье!"

traits.locale_text: "Things are as hard as ever for honest folk under Vladaym… but the scumbags are having a field day!"
"Things are as hard as ever for honest folk under Vladaym… but the scumbags are having a field day!"
"Things are as hard as ever for honest folk under Vladaym... but the scumbags are having a field day!"

languages.text: “在弗拉迪姆的统治下，老实人的日子总是很难过……可那群卑鄙小人却混得风生水起！”
languages.original_text: "Things are as hard as ever for honest folk under Vladaym... but the scumbags are having a field day!"

traits.locale_text: “在弗拉迪姆的统治下，老实人的日子总是很难过……可那群卑鄙小人却混得风生水起！”

languages.text: «Bajo el mandato de Vladaym, los ciudadanos de a pie están peor que nunca... ¡Aunque, para la escoria, es una fiesta constante!».
languages.original_text: "Things are as hard as ever for honest folk under Vladaym... but the scumbags are having a field day!"

traits.locale_text: «Bajo el mandato de Vladaym, los ciudadanos de a pie están peor que nunca... ¡Aunque, para la escoria, es una fiesta constante!».

languages.text: 「ヴラダイムでは正直者ほど生きるのが辛くてバカを見るが…クズみたいな奴にとっては楽園だ！」
languages.original_text: "Things are as hard as ever for honest folk under Vladaym... but the scumbags are having a field day!"

traits.locale_text: 「ヴラダイムでは正直者ほど生きるのが辛くてバカを見るが…クズみたいな奴にとっては楽園だ！」

languages.text: "Für anständige Leute ist es unter Vladaym so hart wie immer ... aber die Mistkerle haben's leicht und schön!"
languages.original_text: "Things are as hard as ever for honest folk under Vladaym... but the scumbags are having a field day!"

traits.locale_text: "Für anständige Leute ist es unter Vladaym so hart wie immer ... aber die Mistkerle haben's leicht und schön!"

languages.text: « La vie est plus dure que jamais pour les honnêtes gens, sous Vladaym... alors que la vermine, par contre, elle se régale ! »
languages.original_text: "Things are as hard as ever for honest folk under Vladaym... but the scumbags are having a field day!"

traits.locale_text: « La vie est plus dure que jamais pour les honnêtes gens, sous Vladaym... alors que la vermine, par contre, elle se régale ! »

languages.text: "Vladaym yönetimi altında namusluların yine yüzü gülmüyor. Şerefsizlerse hep bayram ediyor!"
languages.original_text: "Things are as hard as ever for honest folk under Vladaym... but the scumbags are having a field day!"

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym yönetiminde namuslu kimsenin yüzü hiç gülmedi... Şerefsizlerse bayram etti!"
